Article.Title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

Conditions.Description: Any judgment of a court or tribunal and any decision of an administrative authority of a third country requiring a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data.

Conditions.Requirement: May only be recognised or enforceable in any manner if based on an international agreement.

Conditions.Description: Such as a mutual legal assistance treaty.

Conditions.Parties: The requesting third country and the Union or a Member State.

Content.Note: Without prejudice to other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter.
